column4: I will not go so far as to say utterly, but you are correct. However, it is a fundamental security requirement... regardless of its "complexity". I believe this discussion belongs in #ubuntu-offtopic
That would require a bit more detail ulugbek
understood, I just didn't want to flood with the description yet again
